aim4.gui

Class Viewer.SimThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • aim4.gui.Viewer.SimThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Viewer

    public class Viewer.SimThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The simulation thread that holds the simulation process.
